List package metadata

Source: R/meta_packages.R
meta_packages.Rd

List package metadata in an R universe.

Usage

meta_packages(
  repo = "https://community.r-multiverse.org",
  fields = c("Version", "License", "Remotes", "RemoteSha")
)

Arguments

repo

Character of length 1, URL of the package repository. R-multiverse uses "https://community.r-multiverse.org".

fields

Character string of fields to query.

Value

A data frame with one row per package and columns with package metadata.

See also

Other meta: meta_checks()

Examples

meta_packages(repo = "https://wlandau.r-universe.dev")
#>                                     _id        package     version
#> autometric     6784912a040e85d8a67224db     autometric  0.1.2.9000
#> crew           6785160d040e85d8a6735c43           crew 0.10.2.9001
